price: Ni nk’ukwo Twashoboje gukurikira ukuri abo Dushaka mu bavyeyi bazo, mu ruvyaro rwazo no muri benewabo, Twarabatoye Tubarungika gushikiriza ubutumwa ku bantu babo, Turanabarongora mu nzira igororotse yo gusenga Imana Imwe Rudende Allah Itabangikanywa.
arabic: وَمِنۡ ءَابَآئِهِمۡ وَذُرِّيَّٰتِهِمۡ وَإِخۡوَٰنِهِمۡۖ وَٱجۡتَبَيۡنَٰهُمۡ وَهَدَيۡنَٰهُمۡ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٖ مُّسۡتَقِيمٖ

meta.transliteration: wamin ābāihim wadhurriyyātihim wa-ikh'wānihim wa-ij'tabaynāhum wahadaynāhum ilā ṣirāṭin mus'taqīmin
